participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful, creative, and a bit introverted. Enjoys engaging in deep conversations and appreciates the arts.
participant_1.background: I practice vegetarianism. I like reading a lot. I like watching The Walking Dead. I also enjoy reading the Game of Thrones series books. My favorite books are the Harry Potter books.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing, adventurous, and enthusiastic about new experiences. Loves meeting new people and exploring different perspectives.
participant_2.background: I am a freshman at NYU. I am the youngest in my family. My passion is photography. I have two older brothers. My favorite color is blue.

content.text: Hi there, what do you do for fun?
I'm a freshman at NYU studying photography. I love taking pictures and capturing moments.
Oh that's cool! I'm a big fan of photography too. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love being able to capture moments that I would never have been able to see otherwise. It's like freezing time and being able to hold onto it forever.
I know what you mean! I love looking back on my photos and remembering all the great times I've had.
Me too! It's like a little window into the past.
What kind of photography do you like to do?
I like to do a little bit of everything, but I'm especially interested in street photography and documentary photography.
Oh that's cool! I've always wanted to try street photography, but I'm too shy to talk to strangers.
It's not always easy, but it's a lot of fun. You just have to go out there and start shooting.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to meet new people and learn about different cultures.
I'm sure it is! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone. I've read it multiple times and I always love it.
Oh that's a great book! I love the Harry Potter series too.
Me too! I'm excited to see the new movie coming out.
Me too! I'm a huge Harry Potter fan.
It's always nice to meet another Harry Potter fan
